title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to -  Boeing 787-10 - Using the EFB
description:
In this video we will look at the EFB which is added to the Boeing 787-10 as part of Sim Update 13 which is currently in beta. Prior to touching the EFB we need to prepare the aircraft a bit before touching the EFB if you don't do that you will likely experience some issues using the EFB like I did encounter myself also initially.
